text: Adrian Carlos Uter (born October 27, 1984) is a Jamaican professional basketball player for Vaqueros de Bayamón of the Baloncesto Superior Nacional. ==Professional career== On June 27, 2016, Uter signed with ASVEL Basket of the LNB Pro A. On December 30, 2019, he has signed with Goyang Orions of the Korean Basketball League. ==National team career== Uter represents the Jamaican national basketball team in international competitions. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:AS Monaco Basket players Category:ASVEL Basket players Category:Caciques de Humacao players Category:Goyang Orion Orions players Category:Hapoel Eilat basketball players Category:Hapoel Tel Aviv B.C. players Category:Hofstra Pride men's basketball players Category:Jamaican expatriate basketball people in the United States Category:Jamaican men's basketball players Category:Leones de Ponce basketball players Category:Maccabi Rishon LeZion basketball players Category:Moadon Kadursal HaBikaa players Category:Pallacanestro Cantù players Category:Plateros de Fresnillo players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Saint-Vallier Basket Drôme players Category:Swans Gmunden players
title: Adrian Uter
